titles.title: To amend part Q of title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to ensure that Federal funds made available to hire or rehire law enforcement officers are used in a manner that produces a net gain of the number of law enforcement officers who perform nonadministrative public safety services.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

term.name: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

bill.summary: 1/31/1996--Introduced. Amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to require that Federal funds made available to hire or rehire career law enforcement officers are used by the entity receiving such funds to ensure that such entity achieves a net gain of the number of law enforcement officers who perform nonadministrative public safety service.
